name: Bonded Crusaders
description:
Sharilla and Katid are a soul-bonded crusader and jester. Fate has tied their hearts together, and they are dependant on being near each other to be alive. If they ever get too separated their crusade is over. You play as the deity of the wind and reshape the world to keep their bond alive for a long as possible so that they do not pass away on their hopeless crusade!

Created for Ludum Dare 46!

-Instructions-

Use your mouse to click all interactable objects. You can move everything a single time. Keep both Sharilla and Katid together as long as possible!
